page.title: 08St.Mary's Church.N.Stifford.
page.content: The Rector of the church is called Mr.Cohen. He originally came from Australia.Before he joined the church he was a teacher.He studied for three years and then did a further three years training as a curate.After six years he was ready to become a Rector.He wrote to lots of different Bishops in this country.Some of them replied that he would not be suitable for their parish.Then the Bishop of Brentwood asked him to come and meet some of the parishioners of North Stifford.They asked him lots of questions and then invited him to become their Rector. There are many interesting items in the church.On the wall there are brass rubbings of people who had been members of the church and were now dead.One of these people was named Ann Latham.
